text:
@jeff_kennett 2,000 (40,000) road deaths per year in UK (US) vs 40,000 (100,000) covid deaths SO FAR in 2020.

So let's let covid19 rip like your ideological mates Boris and Don are, what harm can it do us? #jeffed
